languages.text: Капитан патруля возмущена недоверием Лорд-капитана. Пусть к ней обращается сам{mf||а} Вольный Торговец, но корабли ксеносов сейчас на границе владений династии Чорда. Истреблять любых врагов Человечества на торговых путях протектората — прямой приказ Лорд-капитана Инцендии Чорда.

The patrol's captain is outraged by the distrust. A Rogue Trader's will must be obeyed, but the xenoships are currently on the border of the Chorda dynasty's holdings. Exterminating any and all enemies of Humanity on the protectorate's trade routes is a direct order from the Lord Captain, Incendia Chorda, herself.
languages.original_text: Капитан патруля возмущена недоверием Лорд-капитана. Пусть к ней обращается сам{mf||а} Вольный Торговец, но корабли ксеносов сейчас на границе владений династии Чорда. Истреблять любых врагов Человечества на торговых путях протектората — прямой приказ Лорд-капитана Инцендии Чорда.

traits.locale_text: The patrol's captain is outraged by your distrust. You may be a Rogue Trader, but the xenoships are currently on the border of the Chorda dynasty's holdings. Exterminating any enemies of Humanity on the trade routes of the protectorate is a direct order from Lord Captain Incendia Chorda.

The patrol's captain is outraged by your distrust. You may be a Rogue Trader, but the xenoships are currently on the border of the Chorda dynasty's holdings. Exterminating any enemies of Humanity on the trade routes of the protectorate is a direct order from Lord Captain Incendia Chorda.

The patrol's captain is outraged by your distrust. You may be a Rogue Trader, but the xenoships are currently on the border of the Chorda dynasty's holdings. Exterminating any and all enemies of Humanity on the protectorate's trade routes is a direct order from the Lord Captain, Incendia Chorda, herself.

The patrol's captain is outraged by your distrust. You may be a Rogue Trader, but the xenoships are currently on the border of the Chorda dynasty's holdings. Exterminating any and all enemies of Humanity on the protectorate's trade routes is a direct order from the Lord Captain, Incendia Chorda, herself.

The patrol's captain is outraged by the distrust. A Rogue Trader's will must be obeyed, but the xenoships are currently on the border of the Chorda dynasty's holdings. Exterminating any and all enemies of Humanity on the protectorate's trade routes is a direct order from the Lord Captain, Incendia Chorda, herself.

languages.text: 巡逻队的舰长为你的怀疑而愤怒不已。尽管行商浪人的意志确实不容置疑，但此时此刻，异形的飞船正在库尔达王朝的领地边界。而领主舰长因森蒂娅·库尔达亲自下达了命令，要消灭王朝贸易路线上所有的人类之敌。
languages.original_text: The patrol's captain is outraged by the distrust. A Rogue Trader's will must be obeyed, but the xenoships are currently on the border of the Chorda dynasty's holdings. Exterminating any and all enemies of Humanity on the protectorate's trade routes is a direct order from the Lord Captain, Incendia Chorda, herself.

traits.locale_text: 巡逻队的舰长为你的怀疑而愤怒不已。尽管行商浪人的意志确实不容置疑，但此时此刻，异形的飞船正在库尔达王朝的领地边界。而领主舰长因森蒂娅·库尔达亲自下达了命令，要消灭王朝贸易路线上所有的人类之敌。

languages.text: パトロール隊の隊長はあなたが疑っていることに憤慨している。自由開拓者の命令は絶対かもしれないが、異種族の船は現在、チョーダ王朝の保有地の境界線上にいるのだ。保護国家の通商路にいる人類の敵をすべて駆逐することは、ロード・キャプテンのインセンディア・チョーダ自身の直接の命令だ。
languages.original_text: The patrol's captain is outraged by the distrust. A Rogue Trader's will must be obeyed, but the xenoships are currently on the border of the Chorda dynasty's holdings. Exterminating any and all enemies of Humanity on the protectorate's trade routes is a direct order from the Lord Captain, Incendia Chorda, herself.

traits.locale_text: パトロール隊の隊長はあなたが疑っていることに憤慨している。あなたは自由開拓者かもしれないが、異種族の船は現在、チョーダ王朝の保有地の境界線上にいるのだ。保護国家の通商路にいる人類の敵をすべて駆逐することは、ロード・キャプテンのインセンディア・チョーダ自身の直接の命令だ。
パトロール隊の隊長はあなたが疑っていることに憤慨している。あなたは自由開拓者かもしれないが、異種族の船は現在、チョーダ王朝の保有地の境界線上にいるのだ。保護国家の通商路にいる人類の敵をすべて駆逐することは、ロード・キャプテンのインセンディア・チョーダ自身の直接の命令だ。

languages.text: El capitán de la patrulla está indignado por esta desconfianza. La voluntad de los Comerciantes Independientes es incuestionable, pero las naves xenos están en la frontera de los dominios de la dinastía Chorda. Ha sido su Lord Capitán en persona, Incendia Chorda, quien les ha dado la orden de exterminar a todos los enemigos de la Humanidad en las rutas comerciales del protectorado.
languages.original_text: The patrol's captain is outraged by the distrust. A Rogue Trader's will must be obeyed, but the xenoships are currently on the border of the Chorda dynasty's holdings. Exterminating any and all enemies of Humanity on the protectorate's trade routes is a direct order from the Lord Captain, Incendia Chorda, herself.

traits.locale_text: El capitán de la patrulla está indignado por esta desconfianza. La voluntad de los Comerciantes Independientes es incuestionable, pero las naves xenos están en la frontera de los dominios de la dinastía Chorda. Ha sido su Lord Capitán en persona, Incendia Chorda, quien les ha dado la orden de exterminar a todos los enemigos de la Humanidad en las rutas comerciales del protectorado.

languages.text: Der Captain der Patrouille ist angesichts des Misstrauens empört. Dem Willen {mf|eines Freihändlers|einer Freihändlerin} ist Folge zu leisten, aber die Xenoschiffe befinden sich an der Grenze des Territoriums der Chorda-Dynastie. Sämtliche Feinde der Menschheit auf den Handelsrouten des Protektorats auszulöschen, ist ein direkter Befehl des Lord Captains Incendia Chorda persönlich.
languages.original_text: The patrol's captain is outraged by the distrust. A Rogue Trader's will must be obeyed, but the xenoships are currently on the border of the Chorda dynasty's holdings. Exterminating any and all enemies of Humanity on the protectorate's trade routes is a direct order from the Lord Captain, Incendia Chorda, herself.

traits.locale_text: Der Captain der Patrouille ist angesichts des Misstrauens empört. Dem Willen {mf|eines Freihändlers|einer Freihändlerin} ist Folge zu leisten, aber die Xenoschiffe befinden sich an der Grenze des Territoriums der Chorda-Dynastie. Sämtliche Feinde der Menschheit auf den Handelsrouten des Protektorats auszulöschen, ist ein direkter Befehl des Lord Captains Incendia Chorda persönlich.

Der Captain der Patrouille ist erzürnt ob deines Misstrauens. Du magst vielleicht {mf|ein Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin} sein, aber die Xenoschiffe befinden sich an der Grenze des Territoriums der Chorda-Dynastie. Sämtliche Feinde der Menschheit auf den Handelsrouten des Protektorats auszulöschen, ist ein direkter Befehl ihres Lord Captains Incendia Chorda persönlich.

languages.text: Le capitaine de la patrouille est scandalisé par ce manque de confiance. La volonté {mf|du libre-marchand| de la libre-marchande} sera faite, mais le fait est que les vaisseaux xénos se trouvent actuellement aux portes du territoire de la dynastie Chorda. Or, la seigneure-capitaine Incendia en personne a ordonné à ses hommes d'exterminer tous les ennemis de l'humanité croisant sur les routes commerciales de son protectorat.
languages.original_text: The patrol's captain is outraged by the distrust. A Rogue Trader's will must be obeyed, but the xenoships are currently on the border of the Chorda dynasty's holdings. Exterminating any and all enemies of Humanity on the protectorate's trade routes is a direct order from the Lord Captain, Incendia Chorda, herself.

traits.locale_text: Le capitaine de la patrouille est scandalisé par ce manque de confiance. La volonté {mf|du libre-marchand| de la libre-marchande} sera faite, mais le fait est que les vaisseaux xénos se trouvent actuellement aux portes du territoire de la dynastie Chorda. Or, la seigneure-capitaine Incendia en personne a ordonné à ses hommes d'exterminer tous les ennemis de l'humanité croisant sur les routes commerciales de son protectorat.

languages.text: Devriye kaptanı, güvensizliğinden ötürü öfkeleniyor. Bir Hür Tacir'in iradesine itaat edilmesi gerekse de zeno gemileri, şu anda Chorda hanedanlığının mülkünün sınırında. Koruma altındaki ticaret yollarında İnsanlığın tüm düşmanlarını yok etmek, bizzat Lord Kaptan İncendia Chorda'nın doğrudan emri.
languages.original_text: The patrol's captain is outraged by the distrust. A Rogue Trader's will must be obeyed, but the xenoships are currently on the border of the Chorda dynasty's holdings. Exterminating any and all enemies of Humanity on the protectorate's trade routes is a direct order from the Lord Captain, Incendia Chorda, herself.
